items.sentence: Tom only got the gist of what Mary was saying.
I suspect that Tom knows Mary\'s phone number.
What do you want to give Tom for his birthday?
Tom isn\'t the kind of person you think he is.
Tom isn\'t the only one here who knows French.
Tom looked out the window and saw Mary\'s car.
Do you want to go through all this pain again?
I like French, but I can\'t speak it well yet.
Tom didn\'t realize that he\'d made a mistake.
I went to Tom\'s room to see if he was asleep.
The school is considering disciplinary action.
I think Tom is doing a pretty good job for us.
I\'m sure Tom will be able to handle this job.
I\'m tired of eating the same thing every day.
I don\'t have enough money to buy what I want.
I don\'t have the strength to do that anymore.
Tom is one of the most talented people I know.
Tom laughed when I told him what had happened.
Can you watch your brother for a little while?
Tom\'s wife often complains about his snoring.
